attributes.action: urge all mp's found to be abusing public money on expenses resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if I abuse my expenses at work I would get sacked and I didn't take money from the taxpayer. I don't see why these people should keep their jobs.

rejection.details: As explained in our terms and conditions: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms petitions to the Number 10 site should request an action that can be taken by the Prime Minister or Government. In his role as Prime Minister, the PM cannot tell MPs from all parties to resign. We suggest you contact Parliament, contact Gordon Brown as an MP, or contact your MP.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
